name: Obstacle_Course
description:
you use the up, down, left, and right keys to move the player. The goal is to get from point A to B without colliding with anything. If you do, the objects will change color indicating you did. There is still a little bit of functionality I wanna add to the game which I'm currently working on completing and will reupload the game with those functionalities. This is just a very basic obstacle course and my first unity project. 

if you wanna see the coding behind this game 

github: https://github.com/shan11435/Obstacle_Course-Unity
